Andronicus a tragedy : impieties long successe or heavens late revenge. Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
[4], 69 [i.e. 99] p.
Printed for Richard Hall ..., London : 1661.
Although attributed by Wing to Thomas Fuller, it is listed under "Anonymous plays" in the Cambridge bibliography of English literature--Cf. v., p. 661. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
